about_the_game:
Are you prepared to cause mayhem in the Outlands? Unlock the Eradication Essentials, equip yourself with its weapons, and raise your chances of enduring in the unforgiving wilderness. Embark on your journey as a terror of the Outlands and outlast every adversary in the Encounters!

This pack includes:


  • 5x Bugle F1 + 200x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 5x AUR HBAR-T + 200x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 5x Uk vz. 59+ 300x ammo (7.62x39)
  • 5x AUR Para + 200x ammo (9x19 Parabellum)
  • 5x La Chiave 12 + 100x ammo (Shotgun shell)
  • 5x PSS + 100x ammo (7.62x42 PSS)
  • 100x Crowns
detailed_description:
Are you prepared to cause mayhem in the Outlands? Unlock the Eradication Essentials, equip yourself with its weapons, and raise your chances of enduring in the unforgiving wilderness. Embark on your journey as a terror of the Outlands and outlast every adversary in the Encounters!

This pack includes:


  • 5x Bugle F1 + 200x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 5x AUR HBAR-T + 200x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 5x Uk vz. 59+ 300x ammo (7.62x39)
  • 5x AUR Para + 200x ammo (9x19 Parabellum)
  • 5x La Chiave 12 + 100x ammo (Shotgun shell)
  • 5x PSS + 100x ammo (7.62x42 PSS)
  • 100x Crowns

Embark on your journey as a terror of the Outlands and outlast every adversary in the Encounters!
